hero.description: Founded in 2024, Starter exists to help developers build better applications faster. We believe in the power of clean code, beautiful design, and open source collaboration.

story.title:
Driven by passion,
defined by excellence.
story.para1: Our journey began with a simple idea: make web development accessible and enjoyable for everyone. We were tired of bloated frameworks and complex configurations.
story.para2: Today, we are a diverse team of engineers, designers, and thinkers working together to solve complex problems with elegant solutions.

team.title: Meet the Team
team.subtitle: The brilliant minds behind every line of code we write.
team.alex_desc: Visionary leader with 10+ years of experience in SaaS ecosystem development.
team.sarah_desc: Full-stack wizard specializing in building large-scale system architectures.
team.mike_desc: Deeply obsessed with pixel details, smooth UX flows, and accessibility standards.
team.jessica_desc: Creative storyteller helping brands find their unique voice in the digital world.
